name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
January 21, Nanjing. A patriotic anti-counterfeiting blogger posted a video saying that a shopping mall in Nanjing had an advertisement decorated with what looked like the Japanese flag, which contained Japanese culture.
After calling the police, the man angrily shouted in the mall: This is Nanjing, not Tokyo!
After the police intervened, all the mall advertisements were removed. A serious warning was given, and the advertising production company was also interviewed.
But from the picture, we can see that the mall only posted an ordinary geometric sticker.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Who is the next one?

As major media outlets have been making false claims in recent days, on January 21, Zhejiang Daily was not to be outdone and published the article "A girl who returned from overseas to sell shaomai made 200 million yuan in one year."

Netizens have been joking and speculating on who will be the next industry phenom.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On January 21, Beijing CPPCC member and famous influencer Li Yongle proposed this year's two sessions: He hoped that the government would strengthen management and education of influencers. He hoped that a hierarchical system for influencers would be established, and that they would be contacted and guided to learn from each other, help them break through the circle and get to know each other, and solve the problem of online infringement. He hoped that these methods would guide influencers to release more positive information.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On January 20, a blogger said that he was banned from Douyin for 30 days for posting a picture of the "A-share 2760 point defense battle".

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Currently, police are stationed on the Dongfanghong Bridge, and people are not allowed to go there to lay flowers for the dead boy.
Because they could not go up to the bridge, people piled flowers by the river, but they were taken away by sanitation workers that night.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On January 20, in Linyi, Shandong, Baiyi Finance collapsed, and its founder Tang Aiwu absconded with the funds. A large number of investors protested their rights outside the city government building, during which they were met with police intervention and some owners were taken away.

content: January 20, Shantou, Guangdong. Biyue Construction owed workers wages, and the workers sat on the edge of the roof to demand their wages.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: January 20, Nanjing, Jiangsu. Some people held banners on the road to protest their rights. The banners read "Guantanghe Village Committee, return my son's life." During the process, the rights defenders shouted: "Nine years of compulsory education taught us to believe in the country and the party. This is the team led by the Communist Party."

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On January 20, Vista published an article stating that according to statistics, there were 37 hot searches on Weibo in the past year that told stories of young people getting rich by working, an average of 3.1 searches per month, with a rhythm that was neither too dense nor too frequent.
Every ten days, there is a new story about the post-90s and post-00s making money, and every 1.46 weeks, an alternative option is added to the career list of young people.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On the afternoon of January 21, in the Jiangnan New District of Wanzhou, Chongqing, several children threw firecrackers into a manhole cover, causing an explosion. One of the children was injured in the head.
Everyone should pay attention to safety during the Spring Festival

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
The fire broke out in a dormitory of Yingcai School in Yanshanpu Village, Dushu Town, Fangcheng County, Nanyang City, Henan Province. The fire occurred in a dormitory for boys in the third grade of primary school.
Sina News reported on January 20 that the doors of the dormitory were locked when students slept. On January 21, some netizens also said that the dormitory was locked at the time. When the fire broke out, the children trapped in the dormitory leaned on the window and called for their mothers.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On January 21, the director of the local police station went to the victim's family to express his condolences. In the video, a group of people in black stood at the door.
The person who filmed the video said that he has not seen the child yet and is still waiting for DNA testing.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On January 21, the forced demolition site of Gangjiazhai in Xi'an Economic Development Zone.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
The full video of the forced demolition of Gangjiazhai in Xi'an Economic Development Zone on January 21.
In the video, a group of uniformed personnel carried out a man with his head covered by clothes and placed him next to the 120 ambulance, and never lifted the clothes covering his head.
Then, a man covered him with a black coat. None of the dozens of people next to the ambulance tried to rescue him.
After discussing for a while, they carried him to a black van.
